A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class ButtonPanel.ButtonListener
Handle the 4 button events: New Game, Hide/Show Lanes, Pause, and Quit.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class GamePanel.UpdateListener
Handle the timer event.
activateCheat(String) - Method in class Driver
The method activateCheat() compares a string to test if it is a valid cheat code.
activateRandomCar() - Method in class GamePanel
The method activateRandomCar() randomly looks till it finds an inactive car and activates it.
active - Variable in class Car
For non-player cars this defines whether they can move and allows them to be collided with; for player cars, it just defines if they can be collided with.
activeCars - Variable in class GamePanel
number of currently active cars

B

background - Variable in class BackgroundPanel
The image to be used for the animated road background.
background - Variable in class GamePanel
An animated road background.
BackgroundPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
The BackgroundPanel class controls the animation of the road lanes.
BackgroundPanel() - Constructor for class BackgroundPanel
Constructor for objects of class BackgroundPanel.
boring - Variable in class Car
Whether or not the cars are sprites or simple boring blocks.
btnLanes - Variable in class ButtonPanel
Show/Hide lanes button to show/hide lanes.
btnNewGame - Variable in class ButtonPanel
New Game button instance to start new games.
btnPause - Variable in class ButtonPanel
Pause button to pause the game.
btnQuit - Variable in class ButtonPanel
Quit button to quit the game.
ButtonPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
The ButtonPanel class holds the buttons for creating a New Game, Showing/Hiding lane lines, Pausing the game, and Quitting the game.
ButtonPanel(Driver) - Constructor for class ButtonPanel
Constructor for objects of class ButtonPanel.
buttonPanel - Variable in class Driver
The ButtonPanel instance.
ButtonPanel.ButtonListener - Class in <Unnamed>
The ButtonListener that is implemented by the ButtonPanel to control the the specified actions.
ButtonPanel.ButtonListener() - Constructor for class ButtonPanel.ButtonListener
 

C

Car - Class in <Unnamed>
The Car class contains the definition and methods that are used to create and manipulate cars.
Car(int, GamePanel) - Constructor for class Car
Constructor for objects of class Car.
Car(GamePanel) - Constructor for class Car
Constructor for objects of class Car.
cars - Variable in class GamePanel
An array to hold the car instances.
carSprites - Variable in class GamePanel
An array that can hold all of the sprites that are shown for cheats.
carType - Variable in class Car
The type of car; determines colour, speed, and point value
colours - Variable in class Car
Whether or not the car changes colours randomly.
crashes - Variable in class LabelPanel
The number of crashes that have occured.

difficulty - Variable in class GamePanel
the current difficulty level

dodged - Variable in class LabelPanel
The number of cars that have been dodged.

The Driver class contains the code to start the program.

The class InputListener handles the input from the keyboard.

G

The method getPointValue() gets the score the user will get for dodging this car type.

I

The method increaseCrashes() increases the crashes and updates the label.

The method increaseScore() exists as an accessor method for the labelPanel.
increaseScore(int) - Method in class LabelPanel
The method increaseScore() increases the score and updates the labels.
isPointInCar(int, int) - Method in class Car
The method isPointInCar() compares a set of coordinates to check if the point is inside the car.

K

Handle keyTyped events.
killablecars - Variable in class GamePanel
When true killablecars makes it so that clicking on cars will remove them.

N

newCarType() - Method in class Car
The method newCarType() randomly changes the car type and based on the new car type will change the colour.
NewGame() - Method in class Driver
The method NewGame() exists an an accessor method for the gamePanel.
NewGame() - Method in class GamePanel
The method NewGame() resets the game and starts it with a fresh wave of cars.

P

This method draws the background.

This method draws the car.

The method Pause() exists as an accessor method for the gamePanel.
pause - Variable in class GamePanel
whether the game is currently paused.
Pause() - Method in class GamePanel
The method Pause() is a mutator method that toggles whether the game is Paused.
player - Variable in class GamePanel
The player's car.
playerMove - Variable in class GamePanel
Whether dragging the mouse will result in the player moving.

R

randomColor - Variable in class Car
The current random colour.
resetCar() - Method in class Car
The method resetCar() moves the car to the starting position depending on the lane.

S

The ScrollerPanel class holds the slider to set the difficulty and a label stating what difficulty has currently been set.

Constructor for objects of class ScrollerPanel.

The SliderListener that is implemented by the ScrollerPanel to change the difficulty when the slider is changed.

setDifficulty(int) - Method in class GamePanel
The method setDifficulty() changes the difficulty level of the game.
setXLocation(int) - Method in class Car
The method setXLocation() attempts to move the car to the X coordinate and is restricted to certain bounds.
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class ScrollerPanel.SliderListener
Handle the difficulty slider event.

T

testCollision(Car) - Method in class Car
The method testCollision() compares the bounding boxes of 2 cars to test whether they are currently intersecting.
timer - Variable in class GamePanel
The timer instance that is used to control animation and update the game.

The method ToggleBoring() is a mutator for the boring variable.
ToggleBoring() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleBoring() is for the "These Cars Are Boring" cheat.
ToggleColours() - Method in class Car
The method ToggleColours() is a mutator for the colours variable.
ToggleColours() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleColours() is for the "Colours!" cheat.
ToggleGodMode() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleGodMode() is for the "GODMODE" cheat.
ToggleKillableCars() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleKillableCars() is for the "Make Them Go Away" cheat.
ToggleLanes() - Method in class BackgroundPanel
The method ToggleLanes() toggles whether the lanes are showing.
ToggleLanes() - Method in class Driver
The method ToggleLanes() exists an an accessor method for the gamePanel.
ToggleLanes() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleLanes() calls the accessor method in background to toggle the lanes.
ToggleTank() - Method in class GamePanel
The method ToggleTank() is for the "Tank Me Up" cheat.
totalscore - Variable in class LabelPanel
The total score of the player.

U

The method updateFrame() updates the status of the animation.

The method updateYPosition() increments the Y coordinate of the car based on the type of car.
